name: SavageCharles
0:
”Alexa, how savage is charles”
”tell me more please”
”describe please”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how savage is charles
des: This is a short decision tree game centered around my friend Charles. You answer yes/no to questions and it will say why you shouldn't be friends with Charles. It's made in good fun with a lot of inside jokes between the entire class.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
